title: Replication Data for: Prompt-Based Uncertainty Quantification for LLM-Assisted Intrusion Detection (Phase 0)
description: Complete replication package for Phase 0 (Foundation Validation) of the IDS uncertainty estimation study. Includes raw experiment results from 50 LLM-based intrusion detection experiments across 5 uncertainty quantification methods, 5 models, and 2 CIC-IDS benchmark datasets, along with the full experiment code, evaluation scripts, and pre-computed metrics.
notes: Phase 0 foundation validation data. 50 samples per dataset, 5 models, 5 uncertainty methods. See README.md for full documentation.
